tool.name: Add percolator data to PSM table
tool.command: msspsmtable percolator -i '$psmtable' --mzid '$mzidentml' -o psms.txt #if $filterpsm && msspsmtable conffilt -i psms.txt -o filteredpsms.txt --confidence-better lower --confidence-lvl $filterpsm --confcolpattern 'PSM q-value' && mv filteredpsms.txt psms.txt #end if #if $filterpeptide && msspsmtable conffilt -i psms.txt -o filteredpsms.txt --confidence-better lower --confidence-lvl $filterpeptide --confcolpattern 'peptide q-value' && mv filteredpsms.txt psms.txt #end if && mv psms.txt '$output'

param.name: filterpsm
param.label: Cutoff level for percolator PSM q-values?

param.name: filterpeptide
param.label: Cutoff level for percolator peptide q-values?

tool.help: This tool adds percolator data, currently from mzIdentMLs to the PSM table
